pageProduct.name: Oral B Toothpaste Kids Stages 92g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Oral-B Stages Mickey Mouse Berry Bubble Fluoride Toothpaste For Kids is suitable for children of 6 years and younger.

Removes 10 Years of Stains* Start seeing results in 5 days *in as little as 14 days

Oral-B: The Brand More Dentists Use Themselves Worldwide

Suitable For: Children of 6 years and younger

Recommended By: Dentists

Size: 92g

Warnings

In case of intake of fluoride from other sources consult a dentist or doctor. If using flouride supplements, consult your dentist.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Contains Sodium Fluoride (0.11%) 500ppmF. Contains no sugar.

Ingredients

Aqua, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Cellulose Gum, Aroma, Sodium Saccharin, Carbomer, Trisodium Phosphate, Sodium Fluoride, Limonene, CI 42090.

Directions

Use a pea sized amount for supervised brushing to minimize swallowing.
